trans-unit.target: models.E004：如果字段还设置 primary_key=True ,则 id 只能用作字段名称。

trans-unit.target: models.E006：该字段与来自模型 <model> 的字段 <field name> 冲突。

trans-unit.target: models.E007：字段 <field name> 列名 <column name> 由另一个字段使用。

trans-unit.target: models.E009：所有 index_together 元素必须是列表或元组。

trans-unit.target: models.E010： unique_together 必须是列表或元组。

trans-unit.target: models.E011：所有 unique_together 元素都必须是列表或元组。

trans-unit.target: models.E012：indexs indexes/index_together/unique_together 引用不存在的字段 <field name> 。

trans-unit.target: models.E013：indexs indexes/index_together/unique_together 引用 ManyToManyField <field name> ，但是该选项不支持 ManyToManyField 。

trans-unit.source: models.E014: ordering must be a tuple or list (even if you want to order by only one field).
trans-unit.target: models.E014： ordering 必须是一个元组或列表（即使您只想按一个字段订购）。

trans-unit.source: models.E015: ordering refers to the nonexistent field, related field, or lookup <field name>.
trans-unit.target: models.E015： ordering 是指不存在的字段，相关字段或查找 <field name> 。

trans-unit.source: models.E016: indexes/index_together/unique_together refers to field <field_name> which is not local to model <model>.
trans-unit.target: models.E016：indexs indexes/index_together/unique_together 引用字段 <field_name> ，它不是模型 <model> 的本地字段。

trans-unit.source: models.E017: Proxy model <model> contains model fields.
trans-unit.target: models.E017：代理模型 <model> 包含模型字段。

trans-unit.source: models.E018: Autogenerated column name too long for field <field>. Maximum length is <maximum length> for database <alias>.
trans-unit.target: models.E018：自动生成的列名对于字段 <field> 而言太长。数据库 <alias> 的最大长度为 <maximum length> >。

trans-unit.source: models.E019: Autogenerated column name too long for M2M field <M2M field>. Maximum length is <maximum length> for database <alias>.
trans-unit.target: models.E019：自动生成的列名称对于M2M字段 <M2M field> 而言太长。数据库 <alias> 的最大长度为 <maximum length> >。

trans-unit.source: models.E020: The <model>.check() class method is currently overridden.
trans-unit.target: models.E020：当前已覆盖 <model>.check() 类方法。

trans-unit.source: models.E021: ordering and order_with_respect_to cannot be used together.
trans-unit.target: models.E021： ordering 和 order_with_respect_to 不能一起使用。

trans-unit.source: models.E022: <function> contains a lazy reference to <app label>.<model>, but app <app label> isn’t installed or doesn’t provide model <model>.
trans-unit.target: models.E022： <function> 包含对 <app label>.<model> 的惰性引用，但是未安装app <app label> 或不提供 <model> 模型。

trans-unit.source: models.E023: The model name <model> cannot start or end with an underscore as it collides with the query lookup syntax.
trans-unit.target: models.E023：模型名称 <model> 不能与下划线开头或结尾，因为它与查询查找语法冲突。

trans-unit.source: models.E024: The model name <model> cannot contain double underscores as it collides with the query lookup syntax.
trans-unit.target: models.E024：模型名称 <model> 不能包含双下划线，因为它与查询查找语法冲突。

trans-unit.source: models.E025: The property <property name> clashes with a related field accessor.
trans-unit.target: models.E025：属性 <property name> 与相关的字段访问器冲突。

trans-unit.target: models.E026：模型的 primary_key=True 不能包含多个字段。

trans-unit.target: models.E028： db_table <db_table> 被多个模型使用： <model list> 。

trans-unit.target: models.E029：索引名称 <index> 对于模型 <model> 不是唯一的。

trans-unit.target: models.E030：索引名称 <index> 在以下模型之间不是唯一的： <model list> 。

trans-unit.source: models.E031: constraint name <constraint> is not unique for model <model>.
trans-unit.target: models.E031：约束名称 <constraint> 在模型 <model> 中不是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: models.E032: constraint name <constraint> is not unique amongst models: <model list>.
trans-unit.target: models.E032：约束名称 <constraint> 在以下模型之间不是唯一的： <model list> 。

trans-unit.source: models.E033: The index name <index> cannot start with an underscore or a number.
trans-unit.target: models.E033：索引名称 <index> 不能以下划线或数字开头。

trans-unit.source: models.E034: The index name <index> cannot be longer than <max_length> characters.
trans-unit.target: E034：索引名称 <index> 不能超过 <max_length> 个字符。

trans-unit.target: models.W027： <database> 不支持检查约束。

trans-unit.source: models.W035: db_table<db_table> is used by multiple models: <model list>.
trans-unit.target: models.W035： db_table <db_table> 由多个模型使用： <model list> 。

trans-unit.source: module – URLconf module (or module name)
trans-unit.target: 模块 – URLconf模块（或模块名称）

trans-unit.source: mysql.E001: MySQL does not allow unique CharFields to have a max_length > 255.
trans-unit.target: mysql.E001：MySQL不允许唯一的 CharField 的 max_length > 255。

trans-unit.source: mysql.W002: MySQL Strict Mode is not set for database connection ‘<alias>’. See also Setting sql_mode.
trans-unit.target: mysql.W002：未为数据库连接“ <别名>”设置MySQL严格模式。另请参见设置sql_mode。

trans-unit.source: namespace (str) – Instance namespace for the URL entries being included
trans-unit.target: 名称空间（str）–包含的URL条目的实例名称空间

trans-unit.target: pattern_list – path() 和/或 re_path() 实例的可迭代。

trans-unit.target: postgres.E001：数组的基字段有错误：…

trans-unit.target: postgres.E002：数组的基础字段不能为相关字段。

trans-unit.source: postgres.E003: <field> default should be a callable instead of an instance so that it’s not shared between all field instances.
trans-unit.target: postgres.E003： <field> 默认值应该是可调用的，而不是实例，以便不在所有字段实例之间共享。

trans-unit.source: receiver – The callback function which will be connected to this signal. See Receiver functions for more information.
trans-unit.target: 接收器 –将连接到此信号的回调函数。有关更多信息，请参见接收器功能。

trans-unit.source: regex – If not None, overrides regex. Can be a regular expression string or a pre-compiled regular expression.
trans-unit.target: regex –如果不是 None ， regex 覆盖regex。可以是正则表达式字符串或预编译的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: repr(). A QuerySet is evaluated when you call repr() on it. This is for convenience in the Python interactive interpreter, so you can immediately see your results when using the API interactively.
trans-unit.target: repr（）。一个 QuerySet ，当你调用评估 repr() 就可以了。这是为了在Python交互式解释器中提供方便，因此在以交互方式使用API​​时，您可以立即查看结果。

trans-unit.source: security.E023: You have set the SECURE_REFERRER_POLICY setting to an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: security.E023：您已将 SECURE_REFERRER_POLICY 设置设置为无效值。

trans-unit.source: security.W001: You do not have django.middleware.security.SecurityMiddleware in your MIDDLEWARE so the SECURE_HSTS_SECONDS, SECURE_CONTENT_TYPE_NOSNIFF, SECURE_BROWSER_XSS_FILTER, SECURE_REFERRER_POLICY, and SECURE_SSL_REDIRECT settings will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: security.W001：您的 MIDDLEWARE 中没有 django.middleware.security.SecurityMiddleware ，因此 SECURE_HSTS_SECONDS ， SECURE_CONTENT_TYPE_NOSNIFF ， SECURE_BROWSER_XSS_FILTER ， SECURE_REFERRER_POLICY 和 SECURE_SSL_REDIRECT 设置将无效。

trans-unit.source: security.W002: You do not have django.middleware.clickjacking.XFrameOptionsMiddleware in your MIDDLEWARE, so your pages will not be served with an 'x-frame-options' header. Unless there is a good reason for your site to be served in a frame, you should consider enabling this header to help prevent clickjacking attacks.
trans-unit.target: security.W002：您的 MIDDLEWARE 中没有 django.middleware.clickjacking.XFrameOptionsMiddleware ，因此您的页面将不会带有 'x-frame-options' 标头。除非有很好的理由在一个框架中提供您的网站，否则应考虑启用此标头以帮助防止点击劫持攻击。

trans-unit.source: security.W003: You don’t appear to be using Django’s built-in cross-site request forgery protection via the middleware (django.middleware.csrf.CsrfViewMiddleware is not in your MIDDLEWARE). Enabling the middleware is the safest approach to ensure you don’t leave any holes.
trans-unit.target: security.W003：您似乎没有通过中间件使用Django的内置跨站点请求伪造保护（ django.middleware.csrf.CsrfViewMiddleware 不在您的 MIDDLEWARE 中）。启用中间件是确保您没有任何漏洞的最安全方法。

trans-unit.source: security.W004: You have not set a value for the SECURE_HSTS_SECONDS setting. If your entire site is served only over SSL, you may want to consider setting a value and enabling HTTP Strict Transport Security. Be sure to read the documentation first; enabling HSTS carelessly can cause serious, irreversible problems.
trans-unit.target: security.W004：您尚未设置 SECURE_HSTS_SECONDS 设置的值。如果整个站点仅通过SSL进行服务，则可能需要考虑设置一个值并启用HTTP Strict Transport Security。请务必先阅读文档；不小心启用HSTS可能会导致严重的不可逆的问题。

trans-unit.source: security.W005: You have not set the SECURE_HSTS_INCLUDE_SUBDOMAINS setting to True. Without this, your site is potentially vulnerable to attack via an insecure connection to a subdomain. Only set this to True if you are certain that all subdomains of your domain should be served exclusively via SSL.
trans-unit.target: security.W005：您尚未将 SECURE_HSTS_INCLUDE_SUBDOMAINS 设置设置为 True 。否则，您的站点可能会通过与子域的不安全连接而容易受到攻击。仅当确定可以通过SSL专门提供域的所有子域时，才将其设置为 True 。

trans-unit.source: security.W006: Your SECURE_CONTENT_TYPE_NOSNIFF setting is not set to True, so your pages will not be served with an 'X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff' header. You should consider enabling this header to prevent the browser from identifying content types incorrectly.
trans-unit.target: security.W006：您的 SECURE_CONTENT_TYPE_NOSNIFF 设置未设置为 True ，因此您的页面将不会带有 'X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff' 标头。您应该考虑启用此标头，以防止浏览器错误地识别内容类型。

trans-unit.source: security.W007: Your SECURE_BROWSER_XSS_FILTER setting is not set to True, so your pages will not be served with an 'X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block' header. You should consider enabling this header to activate the browser’s XSS filtering and help prevent XSS attacks. This check is removed in Django 3.0 as the ``X-XSS-Protection`` header is no longer honored by modern browsers.
trans-unit.target: security.W007：您的 SECURE_BROWSER_XSS_FILTER 设置未设置为 True ，因此您的页面将不会使用 'X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block' 标头。您应该考虑启用此标头以激活浏览器的XSS过滤并帮助防止XSS攻击。由于现代浏览器不再支持X-XSS-Protection标头，因此该检查在Django 3.0中已被删除。

trans-unit.source: security.W008: Your SECURE_SSL_REDIRECT setting is not set to True. Unless your site should be available over both SSL and non-SSL connections, you may want to either set this setting to True or configure a load balancer or reverse-proxy server to redirect all connections to HTTPS.
trans-unit.target: security.W008：您的 SECURE_SSL_REDIRECT 设置未设置为 True 。除非您的站点可以同时通过SSL和非SSL连接访问，否则您可能需要将此设置设置为 True 或配置负载平衡器或反向代理服务器以将所有连接重定向到HTTPS。

trans-unit.source: security.W009: Your SECRET_KEY has less than 50 characters or less than 5 unique characters. Please generate a long and random SECRET_KEY, otherwise many of Django’s security-critical features will be vulnerable to attack.
trans-unit.target: security.W009：您的 SECRET_KEY 少于50个字符或少于5个唯一字符。请生成一个长而随机的 SECRET_KEY ，否则，Django的许多安全性至关重要的功能将很容易受到攻击。

trans-unit.source: security.W010: You have django.contrib.sessions in your INSTALLED_APPS but you have not set SESSION_COOKIE_SECURE to True. Using a secure-only session cookie makes it more difficult for network traffic sniffers to hijack user sessions.
trans-unit.target: security.W010：您的 INSTALLED_APPS 中具有 django.contrib.sessions ，但尚未将 SESSION_COOKIE_SECURE 设置为 True 。使用仅安全的会话cookie会使网络流量嗅探器更难劫持用户会话。

trans-unit.source: security.W011: You have django.contrib.sessions.middleware.SessionMiddleware in your MIDDLEWARE, but you have not set SESSION_COOKIE_SECURE to True. Using a secure-only session cookie makes it more difficult for network traffic sniffers to hijack user sessions.
trans-unit.target: security.W011：您的 MIDDLEWARE 中具有 django.contrib.sessions.middleware.SessionMiddleware ，但尚未将 SESSION_COOKIE_SECURE 设置为 True 。使用仅安全的会话cookie会使网络流量嗅探器更难劫持用户会话。

trans-unit.source: security.W012: SESSION_COOKIE_SECURE is not set to True. Using a secure-only session cookie makes it more difficult for network traffic sniffers to hijack user sessions.
trans-unit.target: security.W012： SESSION_COOKIE_SECURE 未设置为 True 。使用仅安全的会话cookie会使网络流量嗅探器更难劫持用户会话。

trans-unit.source: security.W013: You have django.contrib.sessions in your INSTALLED_APPS, but you have not set SESSION_COOKIE_HTTPONLY to True. Using an HttpOnly session cookie makes it more difficult for cross-site scripting attacks to hijack user sessions.
trans-unit.target: security.W013：您的 INSTALLED_APPS 中具有 django.contrib.sessions ，但尚未将 SESSION_COOKIE_HTTPONLY 设置为 True 。使用 HttpOnly 会话cookie使得跨站点脚本攻击更难劫持用户会话。

trans-unit.source: security.W014: You have django.contrib.sessions.middleware.SessionMiddleware in your MIDDLEWARE, but you have not set SESSION_COOKIE_HTTPONLY to True. Using an HttpOnly session cookie makes it more difficult for cross-site scripting attacks to hijack user sessions.
trans-unit.target: security.W014：您的 MIDDLEWARE 中具有 django.contrib.sessions.middleware.SessionMiddleware ，但尚未将 SESSION_COOKIE_HTTPONLY 设置为 True 。使用 HttpOnly 会话cookie使得跨站点脚本攻击更难劫持用户会话。

trans-unit.source: security.W015: SESSION_COOKIE_HTTPONLY is not set to True. Using an HttpOnly session cookie makes it more difficult for cross-site scripting attacks to hijack user sessions.
trans-unit.target: security.W015： SESSION_COOKIE_HTTPONLY 未设置为 True 。使用 HttpOnly 会话cookie使得跨站点脚本攻击更难劫持用户会话。

trans-unit.source: security.W016: CSRF_COOKIE_SECURE is not set to True. Using a secure-only CSRF cookie makes it more difficult for network traffic sniffers to steal the CSRF token.
trans-unit.target: security.W016： CSRF_COOKIE_SECURE 未设置为 True 。使用仅安全的CSRF cookie会使网络流量嗅探器更难窃取CSRF令牌。

trans-unit.source: security.W017: CSRF_COOKIE_HTTPONLY is not set to True. Using an HttpOnly CSRF cookie makes it more difficult for cross-site scripting attacks to steal the CSRF token. This check is removed in Django 1.11 as theCSRF_COOKIE_HTTPONLYsetting offers no practical benefit.
trans-unit.target: security.W017： CSRF_COOKIE_HTTPONLY 未设置为 True 。使用 HttpOnly CSRF cookie使得跨站点脚本攻击更难以窃取CSRF令牌。由于 CSRF_COOKIE_HTTPONLY 设置没有实际好处，因此在Django 1.11中已删除此检查。

trans-unit.source: security.W018: You should not have DEBUG set to True in deployment.
trans-unit.target: security.W018：部署中不应将 DEBUG 设置为 True 。

trans-unit.source: security.W019: You have django.middleware.clickjacking.XFrameOptionsMiddleware in your MIDDLEWARE, but X_FRAME_OPTIONS is not set to 'DENY'. Unless there is a good reason for your site to serve other parts of itself in a frame, you should change it to 'DENY'.
trans-unit.target: security.W019：您的 MIDDLEWARE 中具有 django.middleware.clickjacking.XFrameOptionsMiddleware ，但 X_FRAME_OPTIONS 未设置为 'DENY' 。除非您的网站有充分的理由在框架中提供其自身的其他部分，否则应将其更改为 'DENY' 。

trans-unit.source: security.W020: ALLOWED_HOSTS must not be empty in deployment.
trans-unit.target: security.W020：部署中 ALLOWED_HOSTS 不能为空。

trans-unit.source: security.W021: You have not set the SECURE_HSTS_PRELOAD setting to True. Without this, your site cannot be submitted to the browser preload list.
trans-unit.target: security.W021：您尚未将 SECURE_HSTS_PRELOAD 设置设置为 True 。否则，您的网站将无法提交到浏览器的预加载列表。

trans-unit.source: security.W022: You have not set the SECURE_REFERRER_POLICY setting. Without this, your site will not send a Referrer-Policy header. You should consider enabling this header to protect user privacy.

trans-unit.source: A Sitemap class is a Python class that represents a “section” of entries in your sitemap. For example, one Sitemap class could represent all the entries of your Weblog, while another could represent all of the events in your events calendar.

trans-unit.source: A RequestSite object has a similar interface to a normal Site object, except its __init__() method takes an HttpRequest object. It’s able to deduce the domain and name by looking at the request’s domain. It has save() and delete() methods to match the interface of Site, but the methods raise NotImplementedError.

trans-unit.source: A Feed class is a Python class that represents a syndication feed. trans-unit.source: A QuerySet represents a collection of objects from your database. It can have zero, one or many filters. Filters narrow down the query results based on the given parameters. In SQL terms, a QuerySet equates to a SELECT statement, and a filter is a limiting clause such as WHERE or LIMIT.
trans-unit.target: 一个 QuerySet 代表从您的数据库对象的集合。它可以有零个，一个或多个过滤器。过滤器根据给定的参数缩小查询结果的范围。用SQL术语来说， QuerySet 等同于 SELECT 语句，而过滤器是一个限制子句，例如 WHERE 或 LIMIT 。

trans-unit.source: A sequence consisting itself of iterables of exactly two items (e.g. [(A, B), (A, B) ...]) to use as choices for this field. If choices are given, they’re enforced by model validation and the default form widget will be a select box with these choices instead of the standard text field.
trans-unit.target: 一个由恰好两个项目（例如 [(A, B), (A, B) ...] ）的可迭代项组成的序列，可以用作此字段的选择。如果给出了选择，则模型验证将强制执行这些选择，并且默认表单小部件将是具有这些选择的选择框，而不是标准文本字段。

trans-unit.source: A sequence of 2-tuples to use as choices for this field. If this is given, the default form widget will be a select box instead of the standard text field and will limit choices to the choices given.
trans-unit.target: 一个序列的2元组，作为该领域的选择使用。如果指定了此选项，则默认表单窗口小部件将是一个选择框，而不是标准文本字段，并将选择限制为给定的选择。

trans-unit.target: 一个 tzinfo 从UTC子模型的固定偏移。 offset 是UTC以东的整数分钟数。

trans-unit.source: A Case() expression is like the if … elif … else statement in Python. Each condition in the provided When() objects is evaluated in order, until one evaluates to a truthful value. The result expression from the matching When() object is returned.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Case() 表达式类似的 if ... elif ...... else 在声明 Python 。所提供的 When() 对象中的每个 condition 都会按顺序进行评估，直到评估为真实值为止。返回匹配的 When() 对象的 result 表达式。

trans-unit.source: A Context object is a stack. That is, you can push() and pop() it. If you pop() too much, it’ll raise django.template.ContextPopException:
trans-unit.target: 甲 Context 对象是一个堆栈。也就是说，您可以 push() 和 pop() 。如果 pop() 过多，则会引发 django.template.ContextPopException ：

trans-unit.target: 一个 DoesNotExist 访问反向关系时，如果在相关表中的条目不存在异常。例如，如果用户没有由 MySpecialUser 指定的主管：

trans-unit.source: A Field is a subclass of RegisterLookupMixin and thus both Transform and Lookup can be registered on it to be used in QuerySets (e.g. field_name__exact="foo"). All built-in lookups are registered by default.
trans-unit.target: 甲 Field 是的一个子类 RegisterLookupMixin 并因此既 Transform 和 Lookup 可以登记在其上，以在使用 QuerySet S（例如 field_name__exact="foo" ）。默认情况下，所有内置查询都已注册。

trans-unit.source: A Lookup is a generic class to implement lookups. A lookup is a query expression with a left-hand side, lhs; a right-hand side, rhs; and a lookup_name that is used to produce a boolean comparison between lhs and rhs such as lhs in rhs or lhs > rhs.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Lookup 是实现查找一个泛型类。查找是左侧为 lhs 的查询表达式。右手边， rhs ；还有一个 lookup_name ，用于在 lhs 和 rhs 之间进行布尔比较，例如 lhs in rhs 或 lhs > rhs 。

trans-unit.source: A Lookup works against two values, lhs and rhs, standing for left-hand side and right-hand side. The left-hand side is usually a field reference, but it can be anything implementing the query expression API. The right-hand is the value given by the user. In the example Author.objects.filter(name__ne='Jack'), the left-hand side is a reference to the name field of the Author model, and 'Jack' is the right-hand side.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Lookup 工作对两个值， lhs 和 rhs ，站立左侧和右侧。左侧通常是字段引用，但可以是实现查询表达式API的任何内容。右边是用户给定的值。在示例 Author.objects.filter(name__ne='Jack') ，左侧是对 Author 模型的 name 字段的引用，而 'Jack' 是右侧。

trans-unit.source: A Manager is the interface through which database query operations are provided to Django models. At least one Manager exists for every model in a Django application.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Manager 是通过数据库查询操作提供给Django模型的接口。Django应用程序中的每个模型都至少存在一个 Manager 。

trans-unit.source: A QuerySet of model objects from which the choices for the field are derived and which is used to validate the user’s selection. It’s evaluated when the form is rendered.

trans-unit.source: A TemplateResponse can only be rendered once. The first call to SimpleTemplateResponse.render() sets the content of the response; subsequent rendering calls do not change the response content.
trans-unit.target: 一个 TemplateResponse 只能使用一次呈现。第一次调用 SimpleTemplateResponse.render() 设置响应的内容。随后的渲染调用不会更改响应内容。

trans-unit.source: A TestCase, on the other hand, does not truncate tables after a test. Instead, it encloses the test code in a database transaction that is rolled back at the end of the test. This guarantees that the rollback at the end of the test restores the database to its initial state.
trans-unit.target: 一个 TestCase 的，而另一方面，不测试后截断表。相反，它将测试代码包含在数据库事务中，该事务在测试结束时会回滚。这样可以保证测试结束时的回滚将数据库还原到其初始状态。

trans-unit.source: A TransactionTestCase resets the database after the test runs by truncating all tables. A TransactionTestCase may call commit and rollback and observe the effects of these calls on the database.
trans-unit.target: 一个 TransactionTestCase 测试通过截取所有表运行后重置数据库。一个 TransactionTestCase 可以调用commit和回滚并观察数据库这些调用的影响。

trans-unit.source: A Transform is a generic class to implement field transformations. A prominent example is __year that transforms a DateField into a IntegerField.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Transform 是实现现场转换的泛型类。一个 __year 例子是__year，它把 DateField 转换成 IntegerField 。

trans-unit.source: A Value() object represents the smallest possible component of an expression: a simple value. When you need to represent the value of an integer, boolean, or string within an expression, you can wrap that value within a Value().
trans-unit.target: 甲 Value() 对象表示表达式的最小可能的部件：一个简单的值。当您需要在表达式中表示整数，布尔值或字符串的值时，可以将该值包装在 Value() 中。

trans-unit.source: A When() object is used to encapsulate a condition and its result for use in the conditional expression. Using a When() object is similar to using the filter() method. The condition can be specified using field lookups, Q objects, or Expression objects that have an output_field that is a BooleanField. The result is provided using the then keyword.
trans-unit.target: 阿 When() 对象被用于包封状况及其在条件表达式使用结果。使用 When() 对象类似于使用 filter() 方法。可以使用具有 output_field 为 BooleanField 的字段查找， Q 对象或 Expression 对象来指定条件。使用 then 关键字提供结果。

trans-unit.source: A bytes representation of this raster. Returns None for rasters that are not stored in GDAL’s virtual filesystem.
trans-unit.target: 甲 bytes 这个光栅的表示。对于未存储在GDAL虚拟文件系统中的栅格，返回 None 。

trans-unit.source: A count() call performs a SELECT COUNT(*) behind the scenes, so you should always use count() rather than loading all of the record into Python objects and calling len() on the result (unless you need to load the objects into memory anyway, in which case len() will be faster).
trans-unit.target: 一个 count() 调用执行一个 SELECT COUNT(*) 在幕后，所以你应该总是使用 count() ，而不是加载所有的记录为Python对象，并调用 len() 的结果（除非你需要加载的对象进入内存，在这种情况下 len() 会更快）。

trans-unit.source: A flatten() method is also internally used to make Context objects comparable.
trans-unit.target: 甲 flatten() 方法也可用于内部使 Context 对象具有可比性。

trans-unit.source: A max_num value of None (the default) puts a high limit on the number of forms displayed (1000). In practice this is equivalent to no limit.
trans-unit.target: 甲 max_num 的值 None （默认值）穿的形式的数量的上限显示（1000）。在实践中，这等效于无限制。

trans-unit.source: A regex class attribute, as a string.
trans-unit.target: 一个 regex 类属性，作为一个字符串。

trans-unit.source: A str subclass that has been specifically marked as “safe” (requires no further escaping) for HTML output purposes.
trans-unit.target: 一个 str 已被明确标记为“安全”的子类（不需要进一步转义）对HTML输出的目的。

trans-unit.source: A to_python(self, value) method, which handles converting the matched string into the type that should be passed to the view function. It should raise ValueError if it can’t convert the given value. A ValueError is interpreted as no match and as a consequence a 404 response is sent to the user unless another URL pattern matches.
trans-unit.target: 一个 to_python(self, value) 方法，该方法处理将匹配的字符串转换为应传递给view函数的类型。如果无法转换给定值，则应引发 ValueError 。甲 ValueError 异常被解释为不匹配并因此除非另一个URL模式匹配404响应被发送给用户。

trans-unit.source: A to_url(self, value) method, which handles converting the Python type into a string to be used in the URL.
trans-unit.target: 一个 to_url(self, value) 方法，该方法处理将Python类型转换为要在URL中使用的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A fixture is a collection of files that contain the serialized contents of the database. Each fixture has a unique name, and the files that comprise the fixture can be distributed over multiple directories, in multiple applications.
trans-unit.target: 一个夹具是包含数据库的序列化内容的文件的集合。每个固定装置都有唯一的名称，组成固定装置的文件可以分布在多个应用程序的多个目录中。

trans-unit.source: A project’s root directory (the one that contains manage.py) is usually the container for all of a project’s applications which aren’t installed separately.
trans-unit.target: 一个项目的根目录下（包含一个 manage.py ）通常是所有的项目的应用程序未单独安装的容器。

trans-unit.source: A BSD-licensed interface to the GEOS geometry routines, implemented purely in Python using ctypes.
trans-unit.target: BSD许可的GEOS几何例程接口，仅使用 ctypes 在Python中实现。

trans-unit.source: A CSRF cookie that is based on a random secret value, which other sites will not have access to.
trans-unit.target: 一个基于随机秘密值的CSRF cookie,其他网站无法访问。

trans-unit.source: A Django application is a Python package that is specifically intended for use in a Django project. An application may use common Django conventions, such as having models, tests, urls, and views submodules.
trans-unit.target: Django 应用程序是一个Python包，专门用于Django项目。应用程序可以使用常见的Django约定，例如具有 models ， tests ， urls 和 views 子模块。

trans-unit.source: A Django administrative site is represented by an instance of django.contrib.admin.sites.AdminSite; by default, an instance of this class is created as django.contrib.admin.site and you can register your models and ModelAdmin instances with it.
trans-unit.target: Django管理站点由 django.contrib.admin.sites.AdminSite 的实例表示；默认情况下，此类的实例创建为 django.contrib.admin.site ，您可以使用其注册模型和 ModelAdmin 实例。

trans-unit.source: A Django installation doesn’t require any middleware — MIDDLEWARE can be empty, if you’d like — but it’s strongly suggested that you at least use CommonMiddleware.
trans-unit.target: Django安装不需要任何中间件- 如果需要， MIDDLEWARE 可以为空-但强烈建议您至少使用 CommonMiddleware 。

trans-unit.source: A Django project can be configured with one or several template engines (or even zero if you don’t use templates). Django ships built-in backends for its own template system, creatively called the Django template language (DTL), and for the popular alternative Jinja2. Backends for other template languages may be available from third-parties.
trans-unit.target: Django项目可以配置一个或多个模板引擎（如果不使用模板，甚至可以配置为零）。Django为自己的模板系统（其创造性地称为Django模板语言（DTL））和流行的替代Jinja2内置了后端。第三方可能会提供其他模板语言的后端。

trans-unit.source: A Django settings file contains all the configuration of your Django installation. This document explains how settings work and which settings are available.
trans-unit.target: Django设置文件包含了Django安装的所有配置。本文档解释了设置如何工作以及哪些设置是可用的。

trans-unit.source: A Django settings file doesn’t have to define any settings if it doesn’t need to. Each setting has a sensible default value. These defaults live in the module django/conf/global_settings.py.
trans-unit.target: Django设置文件不需要定义任何设置。每个设置都有一个合理的默认值。这些默认值位于 django/conf/global_settings.py 模块中。

trans-unit.source: A Django template is a text document or a Python string marked-up using the Django template language. Some constructs are recognized and interpreted by the template engine. The main ones are variables and tags.
trans-unit.target: Django模板是使用Django模板语言标记的一个文本文档或Python字符串。模板引擎可以识别和解释一些构造。主要是变量和标签。

trans-unit.source: A Full DSN or Easy Connect string can be used in NAME if both HOST and PORT are empty. This format is required when using RAC or pluggable databases without tnsnames.ora, for example.
trans-unit.target: 如果 HOST 和 PORT 均为空，则可以在 NAME 中使用完整的DSN或Easy Connect字符串。例如，当使用不带 tnsnames.ora 的 RAC或可插拔数据库时，此格式是必需的。

trans-unit.source: A MAC (Message Authentication Code) is used to protect the data against changes by the client, so that the session data will be invalidated when being tampered with. The same invalidation happens if the client storing the cookie (e.g. your user’s browser) can’t store all of the session cookie and drops data. Even though Django compresses the data, it’s still entirely possible to exceed the common limit of 4096 bytes per cookie.
trans-unit.target: MAC（消息身份验证代码）用于保护数据免遭客户端更改，从而使会话数据在被篡改时将失效。如果存储cookie的客户端（例如，您的用户的浏览器）无法存储所有会话cookie并丢弃数据，则会发生相同的失效。即使Django压缩数据，也仍然有可能超过每个cookie 4096字节的通用限制。

trans-unit.source: A Place can access its restaurant, if available:
trans-unit.target: 如果有的话,一个地方可以进入其餐厅。

trans-unit.source: A Python “magic method” that returns a string representation of any object. This is what Python and Django will use whenever a model instance needs to be coerced and displayed as a plain string. Most notably, this happens when you display an object in an interactive console or in the admin.
trans-unit.target: Python的“魔术方法”，它返回任何对象的字符串表示形式。这是Python和Django在需要强制模型实例并将其显示为纯字符串时将使用的方式。最值得注意的是，当您在交互式控制台或管理员中显示对象时，会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: A Python package provides a way of grouping related Python code for easy reuse. A package contains one or more files of Python code (also known as “modules”).
trans-unit.target: Python 软件包提供了一种将相关的Python代码进行分组的方法，以方便重用。一个包包含一个或多个Python代码文件（也称为“模块”）。

trans-unit.source: A Python SimpleCookie object, containing the current values of all the client cookies. See the documentation of the http.cookies module for more.
trans-unit.target: 一个Python SimpleCookie 对象，其中包含所有客户端cookie的当前值。有关更多信息，请参见 http.cookies 模块的文档。

trans-unit.source: A Python context manager that uses django.utils.translation.activate() to fetch the translation object for a given language, activates it as the translation object for the current thread and reactivates the previous active language on exit. Optionally, it can deactivate the temporary translation on exit with django.utils.translation.deactivate() if the deactivate argument is True. If you pass None as the language argument, a NullTranslations() instance is activated within the context.
trans-unit.target: 一个Python上下文管理器，它使用 django.utils.translation.activate() 来获取给定语言的翻译对象，将其激活为当前线程的翻译对象，并在退出时重新激活先前的活动语言。（可选 django.utils.translation.deactivate() 如果 deactivate 参数为 True ，则可以使用django.utils.translation.deactivate（）在退出时停用临时翻译。如果将 None 作为语言参数传递， NullTranslations() 在上下文中激活NullTranslations（）实例。

trans-unit.source: A Python logging configuration consists of four parts:
trans-unit.target: 一个Python日志配置由四个部分组成。

trans-unit.source: A Python value passed to Coalesce on MySQL may be converted to an incorrect type unless explicitly cast to the correct database type:
trans-unit.target: 除非明确转换为正确的数据库类型，否则在MySQL Coalesce Python值可能会转换为错误的类型：

trans-unit.source: A Restaurant can access its place:
trans-unit.target: 一个餐厅可以进入它的地方。

trans-unit.source: A URL namespace comes in two parts, both of which are strings:
trans-unit.target: 一个URL命名空间有两部分,都是字符串。

trans-unit.source: A URL pattern is the general form of a URL - for example: /newsarchive/<year>/<month>/.
trans-unit.target: URL模式是URL的一般形式-例如： /newsarchive/<year>/<month>/ 。

trans-unit.source: A backend could implement permissions for the magic admin like this:
trans-unit.target: 后台可以实现魔力管理员这样的权限。

trans-unit.source: A backend-dependent template object (such as those returned by get_template()), the name of a template, or a list of template names.
trans-unit.target: 后端相关的模板对象（例如 get_template() 返回的对象），模板的名称或模板名称的列表。

trans-unit.source: A base class for exceptions raised when a paginator is passed an invalid page number.
trans-unit.target: 当分页器被传递一个无效的页码时引发异常的基类。

trans-unit.source: A base class that provides common behavior for all date-based views. There won’t normally be a reason to instantiate BaseDateListView; instantiate one of the subclasses instead.
trans-unit.target: 为所有基于日期的视图提供通用行为的基类。通常没有理由实例化 BaseDateListView ；实例化子类之一。

trans-unit.source: A base class that provides default implementations for all required methods. By default, it will reject any user and provide no permissions.
trans-unit.target: 一个为所有所需方法提供默认实现的基类。默认情况下,它将拒绝任何用户并不提供任何权限。

trans-unit.source: A base view for displaying a list of objects. It is not intended to be used directly, but rather as a parent class of the django.views.generic.list.ListView or other views representing lists of objects.
trans-unit.target: 用于显示对象列表的基本视图。它不打算直接使用，而是用作 django.views.generic.list.ListView 或表示对象列表的其他视图的父类。

trans-unit.source: A basic function-based view that handles forms may look something like this:
trans-unit.target: 一个基本的基于函数的处理表单的视图可能看起来像这样。

trans-unit.source: A basic migration file looks like this:
trans-unit.target: 一个基本的迁移文件是这样的。

trans-unit.target: 更好的解决方案

trans-unit.source: A better solution removes the content duplication: Both sites use the same article database, and an article is associated with one or more sites. In Django model terminology, that’s represented by a ManyToManyField in the Article model:
trans-unit.target: 一种更好的解决方案消除了内容重复：两个站点都使用相同的文章数据库，并且一个文章与一个或多个站点相关联。在Django模型的术语，这是由一个代表 ManyToManyField 在 Article 模型：

trans-unit.source: A bilateral transformer example
trans-unit.target: 双边变压器的例子

trans-unit.source: A boolean attribute that defines if the URLs of this sitemap should be generated using all of your LANGUAGES. The default is False.
trans-unit.target: 布尔属性，用于定义是否应使用所有 LANGUAGES 生成此站点地图的URL 。默认值为 False 。

trans-unit.source: A boolean attribute that indicates whether the user is considered “active”. This attribute is provided as an attribute on AbstractBaseUser defaulting to True. How you choose to implement it will depend on the details of your chosen auth backends. See the documentation of the is_active attribute on the built-in user model for details.
trans-unit.target: 指示用户是否被视为“活跃”的布尔属性。此属性作为 AbstractBaseUser 上的属性提供，默认为 True 。您如何选择实施它取决于您选择的身份验证后端的详细信息。有关详细信息，请参见 is_active attribute on the built-in user model 的is_active属性的文档。

trans-unit.source: A boolean defining inheritance behavior for Media declarations.
trans-unit.target: 定义 Media 声明的继承行为的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: A boolean indicating if this raster is stored in GDAL’s virtual filesystem.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，指示此栅格是否存储在GDAL的虚拟文件系统中。

trans-unit.source: A boolean indicating whether the command outputs SQL statements; if True, the output will automatically be wrapped with BEGIN; and COMMIT;. Default value is False.
trans-unit.target: 指示命令是否输出SQL语句的布尔值；如果为 True ，则输出将自动用 BEGIN; 包装；和 COMMIT; 。默认值为 False 。

trans-unit.source: A boolean indicating whether the response content has been rendered.
trans-unit.target: 表示响应内容是否已呈现的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: A boolean indicating whether this transformation should apply to both lhs and rhs. Bilateral transformations will be applied to rhs in the same order as they appear in the lookup expression. By default it is set to False. For example usage, see Custom Lookups.
trans-unit.target: 指示此转换是否应同时应用于 lhs 和 rhs 的布尔值。双边变换将以与查找表达式中出现的顺序相同的顺序应用于 rhs 。默认情况下，它设置为 False 。有关用法示例，请参阅“ 自定义查找”。

trans-unit.source: A boolean instructing the field to accept Unicode letters in addition to ASCII letters. Defaults to False.
trans-unit.target: 布尔值，指示字段除ASCII字母外还接受Unicode字母。默认为 False 。

trans-unit.source: A boolean specifying whether to display the page if no objects are available. If this is False and no objects are available, the view will raise a 404 instead of displaying an empty page. By default, this is True.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，指定在没有可用对象时是否显示页面。如果为 False 且没有可用的对象，则视图将引发404而不是显示空白页面。默认情况下，这是 True 。

trans-unit.source: A boolean specifying whether to display the page if no objects are available. If this is True and no objects are available, the view will display an empty page instead of raising a 404.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，指定在没有可用对象时是否显示页面。如果为 True ,并且没有可用的对象，则视图将显示一个空白页面，而不是引发404。

trans-unit.source: A boolean specifying whether to include “future” objects on this page, where “future” means objects in which the field specified in date_field is greater than the current date/time. By default, this is False.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，指定是否在此页面上包括“ future”对象，其中“ future”是指 date_field 中指定的字段大于当前日期/时间的对象。默认情况下，这是 False 。

trans-unit.source: A boolean specifying whether to retrieve the full list of objects for this year and pass those to the template. If True, the list of objects will be made available to the context. If False, the None queryset will be used as the object list. By default, this is False.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，指定是否检索今年的对象的完整列表并将其传递给模板。如果为 True ，则将使对象列表可用于上下文。如果为 False ，则将 None 查询集用作对象列表。默认情况下，这是 False 。

trans-unit.source: A boolean that specifies if datetimes will be timezone-aware by default or not. If this is set to True, Django will use timezone-aware datetimes internally. Otherwise, Django will use naive datetimes in local time.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，用于指定日期时间默认情况下是否支持时区。如果将其设置为 True ，则Django将在内部使用可识别时区的日期时间。否则，Django将在本地时间使用原始日期时间。

trans-unit.source: A boolean that specifies if localized formatting of data will be enabled by default or not. If this is set to True, e.g. Django will display numbers and dates using the format of the current locale.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，指定默认情况下是否启用数据的本地化格式。如果将其设置为 True ，例如Django将使用当前语言环境的格式显示数字和日期。

trans-unit.source: A boolean that specifies whether Django’s translation system should be enabled. This provides a way to turn it off, for performance. If this is set to False, Django will make some optimizations so as not to load the translation machinery.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，指定是否应启用Django的翻译系统。这提供了一种将其关闭以提高性能的方法。如果将其设置为 False ，则Django将进行一些优化，以免加载翻译机制。

trans-unit.source: A boolean that specifies whether to display numbers using a thousand separator. When USE_L10N is set to True and if this is also set to True, Django will use the values of THOUSAND_SEPARATOR and NUMBER_GROUPING to format numbers unless the locale already has an existing thousands separator. If there is a thousands separator in the locale format, it will have higher precedence and will be applied instead.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，指定是否使用千位分隔符显示数字。当 USE_L10N 设置为 True ，如果这也设置为 True ，Django会使用的值 THOUSAND_SEPARATOR 和 NUMBER_GROUPING 格式化数字，除非该区域已经有一个现有的千位分隔符。如果在区域设置格式中有一个千位分隔符，它将具有更高的优先级，并将被应用。

trans-unit.source: A boolean that specifies whether to use the X-Forwarded-Host header in preference to the Host header. This should only be enabled if a proxy which sets this header is in use.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，指定是否优先于 Host 标头使用 X-Forwarded-Host 标头。仅当使用设置此标头的代理时，才应启用此功能。

trans-unit.source: A boolean that specifies whether to use the X-Forwarded-Port header in preference to the SERVER_PORTMETA variable. This should only be enabled if a proxy which sets this header is in use.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，指定是否优先于 SERVER_PORT META 变量使用 X-Forwarded-Port 标头。仅当使用设置此标头的代理时，才应启用此功能。

trans-unit.source: A boolean that turns on/off debug mode.
trans-unit.target: 一个开启/关闭调试模式的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: A boolean; True if a new record was created.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值；如果创建了新记录，则为 True 。

trans-unit.source: A boolean; True if the model is saved exactly as presented (i.e. when loading a fixture). One should not query/modify other records in the database as the database might not be in a consistent state yet.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值；如果模型的保存与显示的完全一样（即在加载夹具时），则为 True 。一个人不应查询/修改数据库中的其他记录，因为该数据库可能尚未处于一致状态。

trans-unit.source: A boolean; True if the setting is applied, False if restored.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值； True 如果设置应用， False 如果恢复。

trans-unit.source: A boolean; if True, the command prints a warning if the set of migrations on disk don’t match the migrations in the database. A warning doesn’t prevent the command from executing. Default value is False.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值；如果为 True ，则该命令将在磁盘上的迁移集与数据库中的迁移集不匹配时显示警告。警告不会阻止命令执行。默认值为 False 。

trans-unit.source: A boolean; if True, the entire Django project will be checked for potential problems prior to executing the command. Default value is True.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值；如果为 True ，则在执行命令之前将检查整个Django项目是否存在潜在问题。默认值为 True 。

trans-unit.source: A bound form has submitted data, and hence can be used to tell if that data is valid. If an invalid bound form is rendered, it can include inline error messages telling the user what data to correct.

trans-unit.source: A bytestring does not carry any information with it about its encoding. For that reason, we have to make an assumption, and Django assumes that all bytestrings are in UTF-8.

trans-unit.source: A common task for web applications is to search some data in the database with user input. In a simple case, this could be filtering a list of objects by a category. trans-unit.source: A datetime represents a point in time. It’s absolute: it doesn’t depend on anything. On the contrary, a date is a calendaring concept. It’s a period of time whose bounds depend on the time zone in which the date is considered. As you can see, these two concepts are fundamentally different, and converting a datetime to a date isn’t a deterministic operation.
trans-unit.target: 日期时间代表一个时间点。这是绝对的：它不依赖任何东西。相反，日期是一个日历概念。这是一个时间段，其范围取决于考虑日期的时区。如您所见，这两个概念本质上是不同的，并且将datetime转换为date并不是确定性的操作。

trans-unit.source: A final point about Memcached is that memory-based caching has a disadvantage: because the cached data is stored in memory, the data will be lost if your server crashes. Clearly, memory isn’t intended for permanent data storage, so don’t rely on memory-based caching as your only data storage. Without a doubt, none of the Django caching backends should be used for permanent storage – they’re all intended to be solutions for caching, not storage – but we point this out here because memory-based caching is particularly temporary.
trans-unit.target: 关于Memcached的最后一点是基于内存的缓存有一个缺点：由于缓存的数据存储在内存中，因此如果服务器崩溃，数据将丢失。显然，内存不是用于永久性数据存储的，因此不要依赖基于内存的缓存作为唯一的数据存储。毫无疑问，任何 Django缓存后端都不应该用于永久存储-它们都旨在作为缓存而不是存储的解决方案-但我们在这里指出这一点是因为基于内存的缓存特别临时。

The most straightforward way of creating a fixture if you’ve already got some data is to use the manage.py dumpdata command. Or, you can write fixtures by hand; fixtures can be written as JSON, XML or YAML (with PyYAML installed) documents. The serialization documentation has more details about each of these supported serialization formats.

trans-unit.source: A fundamental trade-off in dynamic websites is, well, they’re dynamic. Each time a user requests a page, the Web server makes all sorts of calculations – from database queries to template rendering to business logic – to create the page that your site’s visitor sees. This is a lot more expensive, from a processing-overhead perspective, than your standard read-a-file-off-the-filesystem server arrangement.
trans-unit.target: 动态网站的基本权衡是动态的。每次用户请求页面时，Web服务器都会进行各种计算-从数据库查询到模板呈现再到业务逻辑-创建站点访问者可以看到的页面。从处理开销的角度来看，这比标准的从文件中读取文件的服务器系统要贵得多。

trans-unit.source: A good first look at writing tests for Django can be found in the documentation on Writing and running tests.
trans-unit.target: 可以在编写和运行测试的文档中找到有关为Django编写测试的良好概览。

trans-unit.source: A good way to do this is to write your new tests first, before making any changes to the code. This style of development is called test-driven development and can be applied to both entire projects and single patches. After writing your tests, you then run them to make sure that they do indeed fail (since you haven’t fixed that bug or added that feature yet). If your new tests don’t fail, you’ll need to fix them so that they do. After all, a regression test that passes regardless of whether a bug is present is not very helpful at preventing that bug from reoccurring down the road.
trans-unit.target: 一个好的方法是在对代码进行任何更改之前先编写新测试。这种开发方式称为测试驱动开发，可以应用于整个项目和单个补丁。在编写测试之后，您可以运行它们以确保它们确实失败了（因为您尚未修复该错误或尚未添加该功能）。如果您的新测试没有失败，则需要对其进行修复以使其成功。毕竟，无论是否存在bug都通过的回归测试对防止该bug再次发生并不是很有帮助。

trans-unit.source: A good way to spot untested parts of your application is to check code coverage. This also helps identify fragile or even dead code. If you can’t test a piece of code, it usually means that code should be refactored or removed. Coverage will help to identify dead code. See Integration with coverage.py for details.
trans-unit.target: 找出应用程序未经测试的部分的一种好方法是检查代码覆盖率。这也有助于识别易碎甚至死代码。如果您无法测试一段代码，通常意味着应该重构或删除代码。覆盖范围将有助于识别无效代码。有关详细信息，请参见与coverage.py集成。

The salt is regenerated on every call to get_token() so that the form field value is changed in every such response.

trans-unit.source: A list of hosts which are trusted origins for unsafe requests (e.g. POST). For a secure unsafe request, Django’s CSRF protection requires that the request have a Referer header that matches the origin present in the Host header. This prevents, for example, a POST request from subdomain.example.com from succeeding against api.example.com. If you need cross-origin unsafe requests over HTTPS, continuing the example, add "subdomain.example.com" to this list. The setting also supports subdomains, so you could add ".example.com", for example, to allow access from all subdomains of example.com.
trans-unit.target: 是不安全请求（例如 POST ）的可信来源的主机列表。对于不安全的 secure 请求，Django的CSRF保护要求该请求的 Referer 标头与 Host 标头中存在的来源匹配。例如，这可防止 subdomain.example.com 发出的 POST 请求针对 api.example.com 失败。如果您需要通过HTTPS进行跨域的不安全请求，请继续执行该示例，然后将 "subdomain.example.com" 添加到此列表中。该设置还支持子域，因此您可以添加 ".example.com" ，例如，以允许从 example.com 的所有子域进行访问。

trans-unit.source: A middleware factory is a callable that takes a get_response callable and returns a middleware. A middleware is a callable that takes a request and returns a response, just like a view.
trans-unit.target: 中间件工厂是一个可调用对象，它接受 get_response 可调用对象并返回中间件。中间件是可调用的，它接受请求并返回响应，就像视图一样。

trans-unit.source: A mixin class providing common behavior for all date-based views.
trans-unit.target: 一个混合类,为所有基于数据的视图提供通用行为。

trans-unit.source: A mixin class that performs template-based response rendering for views that operate upon a list of object instances. Requires that the view it is mixed with provides self.object_list, the list of object instances that the view is operating on. self.object_list may be, but is not required to be, a QuerySet.
trans-unit.target: 一个mixin类，该类对在对象实例列表上运行的视图执行基于模板的响应呈现。要求与之混合的视图提供 self.object_list ，该视图在其上进行操作的对象实例的列表。 self.object_list 可以是 QuerySet ，但不是必需的。

trans-unit.source: A mixin class that performs template-based response rendering for views that operate upon a single object instance. Requires that the view it is mixed with provides self.object, the object instance that the view is operating on. self.object will usually be, but is not required to be, an instance of a Django model. It may be None if the view is in the process of constructing a new instance.
trans-unit.target: 一个mixin类，该类对在单个对象实例上运行的视图执行基于模板的响应呈现。要求与之混合的视图提供 self.object ，即该视图所操作的对象实例。 self.object 通常是（但不是必需）Django模型的实例。如果视图正在构造新实例，则可能为 None 。

trans-unit.source: A model is the single, definitive source of data about your data. It contains the essential fields and behaviors of the data you’re storing. Generally, each model maps to a single database table.
trans-unit.target: 模型是有关数据的唯一确定的数据源。它包含要存储数据的基本字段和行为。通常，每个模型都映射到单个数据库表。

trans-unit.source: A model is the single, definitive source of truth about your data. It contains the essential fields and behaviors of the data you’re storing. Django follows the DRY Principle. The goal is to define your data model in one place and automatically derive things from it.
trans-unit.target: 模型是有关数据的唯一，确定的事实来源。它包含要存储数据的基本字段和行为。Django遵循DRY原则。目标是在一处定义您的数据模型并自动从中派生数据。

trans-unit.source: A new raster is created when a dict is passed to the GDALRaster constructor. The dictionary contains defining parameters of the new raster, such as the origin, size, or spatial reference system. The dictionary can also contain pixel data and information about the format of the new raster. The resulting raster can therefore be file-based or memory-based, depending on the driver specified.
trans-unit.target: 将 dict 传递给 GDALRaster 构造函数时，将创建一个新的栅格。词典包含新栅格的定义参数，例如原点，大小或空间参照系。词典还可以包含像素数据和有关新栅格格式的信息。因此，生成的栅格可以基于文件或基于内存，具体取决于指定的驱动程序。

trans-unit.source: A proxy model must inherit from exactly one non-abstract model class. You can’t inherit from multiple non-abstract models as the proxy model doesn’t provide any connection between the rows in the different database tables. A proxy model can inherit from any number of abstract model classes, providing they do not define any model fields. A proxy model may also inherit from any number of proxy models that share a common non-abstract parent class.
trans-unit.target: 代理模型必须完全继承一个非抽象模型类。您不能从多个非抽象模型继承，因为代理模型不提供不同数据库表中各行之间的任何连接。代理模型可以从任意数量的抽象模型类继承，只要它们没有定义任何模型字段即可。代理模型也可以从共享公共非抽象父类的任何数量的代理模型中继承。

trans-unit.source: A savepoint is a marker within a transaction that enables you to roll back part of a transaction, rather than the full transaction. Savepoints are available with the SQLite, PostgreSQL, Oracle, and MySQL (when using the InnoDB storage engine) backends. Other backends provide the savepoint functions, but they’re empty operations – they don’t actually do anything.
trans-unit.target: 保存点是事务中的标记，使您可以回滚事务的一部分而不是全部事务。保存点可用于SQLite，PostgreSQL，Oracle和MySQL后端（使用InnoDB存储引擎时）。其他后端提供了保存点功能，但它们是空操作–实际上不执行任何操作。

This will usually be a username of some kind, but it can also be an email address, or any other unique identifier. The field must be unique (i.e., have unique=True set in its definition), unless you use a custom authentication backend that can support non-unique usernames.

trans-unit.source: A string representing the current encoding used to decode form submission data (or None, which means the DEFAULT_CHARSET setting is used). You can write to this attribute to change the encoding used when accessing the form data. Any subsequent attribute accesses (such as reading from GET or POST) will use the new encoding value. Useful if you know the form data is not in the DEFAULT_CHARSET encoding.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，代表用于解码表单提交数据的当前编码（或 None ，这意味着使用 DEFAULT_CHARSET 设置）。您可以写入此属性以更改访问表单数据时使用的编码。任何后续的属性访问（例如从 GET 或 POST 读取）都将使用新的 encoding 值。如果您知道表单数据不是采用 DEFAULT_CHARSET 编码，则很有用。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the full Python import path to your root URLconf, for example "mydjangoapps.urls". Can be overridden on a per-request basis by setting the attribute urlconf on the incoming HttpRequest object. See How Django processes a request for details.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，代表您的根URLconf的完整Python导入路径，例如 "mydjangoapps.urls" 。可以通过在传入的 HttpRequest 对象上设置属性 urlconf 来按请求覆盖。有关详细信息，请参见Django如何处理请求。

trans-unit.target: 表示此安装的语言代码的字符串。这应该是标准语言ID格式。例如，美国英语为 "en-us" 。另请参阅语言标识符以及国际化和本地化的列表。

trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，指定GDAL库的位置。通常，仅当GDAL库位于非标准位置（例如 /home/john/lib/libgdal.so ）时才使用此设置。

trans-unit.source: A string specifying the name to use for the page parameter. The view will expect this parameter to be available either as a query string parameter (via request.GET) or as a kwarg variable specified in the URLconf. Defaults to page.

trans-unit.source: A string that will be automatically included (prepended by default) to all cache keys used by the Django server.

trans-unit.source: A string which will be prefixed to the cache keys generated by the cache middleware. This prefix is combined with the KEY_PREFIX setting; it does not replace it.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，该字符串将作为由缓存中间件生成的缓存键的前缀。此前缀与 KEY_PREFIX 设置结合使用；它不会替代它。

trans-unit.target: 精简版的Apache

trans-unit.source: A subclass of the StaticFilesStorage storage backend which stores the file names it handles by appending the MD5 hash of the file’s content to the filename. For example, the file css/styles.css would also be saved as css/styles.55e7cbb9ba48.css.
trans-unit.target: StaticFilesStorage 存储后端的子类，它通过将文件内容的MD5哈希附加到文件名来存储它处理的文件名。例如，文件 css/styles.css 也将另存为 css/styles.55e7cbb9ba48.css 。

trans-unit.source: A subclass of the FileSystemStorage storage backend that uses the STATIC_ROOT setting as the base file system location and the STATIC_URL setting respectively as the base URL.
trans-unit.target: FileSystemStorage 存储后端的子类，分别使用 STATIC_ROOT 设置作为基础文件系统位置和 STATIC_URL 设置作为基础URL。

trans-unit.source: A tablespace can be specified for the table generated by a model by supplying the db_tablespace option inside the model’s class Meta. This option also affects tables automatically created for ManyToManyFields in the model.
trans-unit.target: 通过在模型的 class Meta 内提供 db_tablespace 选项，可以为模型生成的表指定表空间。此选项还会影响为模型中的 ManyToManyField 自动创建的表。

trans-unit.source: A template contains variables, which get replaced with values when the template is evaluated, and tags, which control the logic of the template.
trans-unit.target: 模板包含变量（在评估模板时将其替换为值）和标签（用于控制模板的逻辑）。

trans-unit.source: A template is a text file. It can generate any text-based format (HTML, XML, CSV, etc.).
trans-unit.target: 模板是一个文本文件。它可以生成任何基于文本的格式(HTML、XML、CSV等)。

trans-unit.source: A template is rendered with a context. Rendering replaces variables with their values, which are looked up in the context, and executes tags. Everything else is output as is.
trans-unit.target: 模板是通过上下文来渲染的。渲染用变量的值替换变量,变量的值在上下文中查找,并执行标签。其他的一切都按原样输出。

trans-unit.source: A test case for a database-backed website isn’t much use if there isn’t any data in the database. Tests are more readable and it’s more maintainable to create objects using the ORM, for example in TestCase.setUpTestData(), however, you can also use fixtures.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据库中没有任何数据，那么用于数据库支持的网站的测试用例就没有多大用处。测试使用ORM创建对象时更具可读性，并且更易于维护，例如在 TestCase.setUpTestData() 中，但是，您也可以使用固定装置。

trans-unit.source: A test client has two attributes that store persistent state information. You can access these properties as part of a test condition.
trans-unit.target: 测试客户端有两个属性,存储持久化的状态信息。你可以作为测试条件的一部分来访问这些属性。

trans-unit.source: A test for a view
trans-unit.target: 观点的测试

trans-unit.source: A test runner is a class defining a run_tests() method. Django ships with a DiscoverRunner class that defines the default Django testing behavior. This class defines the run_tests() entry point, plus a selection of other methods that are used to by run_tests() to set up, execute and tear down the test suite.
trans-unit.target: 测试运行程序是定义 run_tests() 方法的类。Django附带有 DiscoverRunner 类，该类定义默认的Django测试行为。此类定义了 run_tests() 入口点，以及 run_tests() 用来设置，执行和拆除测试套件的其他方法的选择。

trans-unit.source: A time, represented in Python by a datetime.time instance. Accepts the same auto-population options as DateField.

trans-unit.source: A transaction is an atomic set of database queries. Even if your program crashes, the database guarantees that either all the changes will be applied, or none of them.
trans-unit.target: 一个事务是一组原子式的数据库查询。即使你的程序崩溃了,数据库也会保证所有的更改都会被应用,或者不应用。

trans-unit.source: A transformer example

trans-unit.target: 一个真/假字段。

trans-unit.target: 描述所需的JavaScript文件的元组。有关如何指定这些文件的路径的详细信息，请参见路径部分。

trans-unit.source: A tuple of fields whose values are cleaned and subsequently combined into a single value. Each value of the field is cleaned by the corresponding field in fields – the first value is cleaned by the first field, the second value is cleaned by the second field, etc. Once all fields are cleaned, the list of clean values is combined into a single value by compress().
trans-unit.target: 一个字段的元组，其值已清除，然后合并为一个值。该字段的每个值由相应的场在清洁 fields -所述第一值是由第一场清洗，所述第二值是由所述第二字段等清洗一次所有字段都被清洗，清洁值的列表被合并成 compress() 的单个值。

trans-unit.source: A tuple of three values that provides information about the unhandled exception, if any, that occurred during the view.
trans-unit.target: 一个由三个值组成的元组,它提供了关于在视图期间发生的未处理异常(如果有)的信息。

trans-unit.target: 一个代表信封的元组。

trans-unit.source: A user may set this environment variable to customize the library paths they want to use. The typical library directory for software built from source is /usr/local/lib. Thus, /usr/local/lib needs to be included in the LD_LIBRARY_PATH variable. For example, the user could place the following in their bash profile:
trans-unit.target: 用户可以设置此环境变量来定制他们要使用的库路径。从源构建的软件的典型库目录是 /usr/local/lib 。因此， /usr/local/lib 需要包含在 LD_LIBRARY_PATH 变量中。例如，用户可以将以下内容放入其bash个人资料中：

trans-unit.source: A user usually faces two kinds of caches: their own browser cache (a private cache) and their provider’s cache (a public cache). A public cache is used by multiple users and controlled by someone else. This poses problems with sensitive data–you don’t want, say, your bank account number stored in a public cache. So Web applications need a way to tell caches which data is private and which is public.
trans-unit.target: 用户通常面临两种缓存：他们自己的浏览器缓存（私有缓存）和提供者的缓存（公共缓存）。公共缓存由多个用户使用，并由其他人控制。这给敏感数据带来了问题-例如，您不想将您的银行帐号存储在公共缓存中。因此，Web应用程序需要一种方法来告诉缓存哪些数据是私有数据，哪些是公共数据。

trans-unit.source: A validator is a callable that takes a value and raises a ValidationError if it doesn’t meet some criteria. Validators can be useful for re-using validation logic between different types of fields.
trans-unit.target: 验证器是可调用的，它采用一个值，如果不满足某些条件，则会引发 ValidationError 。验证器对于在不同类型的字段之间重用验证逻辑很有用。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 for CULL_FREQUENCY means that the entire cache will be dumped when MAX_ENTRIES is reached. On some backends (database in particular) this makes culling much faster at the expense of more cache misses.
trans-unit.target: 的值 0 用于 CULL_FREQUENCY 意味着当整个高速缓存将倾 MAX_ENTRIES 达到。在一些后端（ database 特别），这使得灭杀多快了更高速缓存未命中的代价。

trans-unit.source: A variable can only be called if it has no required arguments. Otherwise, the system will return the value of the engine’s string_if_invalid option.
trans-unit.target: 如果变量没有必需的参数，则只能调用它。否则，系统将返回引擎的 string_if_invalid 选项的值。

trans-unit.source: A variable outputs a value from the context, which is a dict-like object mapping keys to values.
trans-unit.target: 变量从上下文中输出一个值,上下文是一个类似于dict的对象,将键映射到值。

trans-unit.source: A verbose description of the field, e.g. for the django.contrib.admindocs application.
trans-unit.target: 该字段的详细说明，例如 django.contrib.admindocs 应用程序。

trans-unit.source: A version of str.format() for when format_string, args, and/or kwargs contain lazy objects. The first argument is the string to be formatted. For example:
trans-unit.target: 当 format_string ， args 和/或 kwargs 包含惰性对象时的 str.format() 版本。第一个参数是要格式化的字符串。例如：

trans-unit.source: A version of Python’s urllib.parse.urlencode() function that can operate on MultiValueDict and non-string values.
trans-unit.target: Python的 urllib.parse.urlencode() 函数的一个版本，可以对 MultiValueDict 和非字符串值进行操作。

trans-unit.source: A view function, or view for short, is a Python function that takes a Web request and returns a Web response. This response can be the HTML contents of a Web page, or a redirect, or a 404 error, or an XML document, or an image . . . or anything, really. The view itself contains whatever arbitrary logic is necessary to return that response. This code can live anywhere you want, as long as it’s on your Python path. There’s no other requirement–no “magic,” so to speak. For the sake of putting the code somewhere, the convention is to put views in a file called views.py, placed in your project or application directory.
trans-unit.target: 视图函数（或简称视图）是一个Python函数，它接受Web请求并返回Web响应。此响应可以是网页的HTML内容，重定向，404错误，XML文档或图像。 。 。或任何东西，真的。视图本身包含返回该响应所需的任何任意逻辑。该代码可以存在于您想要的任何地方，只要它在Python路径上即可。可以说，没有其他要求-没有“魔术”。为了将代码放在某处，惯例是将视图放在名为 views.py 的文件中，该文件位于项目或应用程序目录中。

trans-unit.source: A view handling this form will receive the file data in request.FILES, which is a dictionary containing a key for each FileField (or ImageField, or other FileField subclass) in the form. So the data from the above form would be accessible as request.FILES['file'].
trans-unit.target: 处理此表单的视图将在 request.FILES 中接收文件数据，request.FILES是一个字典，其中包含该表单中每个 FileField （或 ImageField 或其他 FileField 子类）的键。因此，可以将上述表格中的数据作为 request.FILES['file'] 进行访问。

trans-unit.source: A view is a “type” of Web page in your Django application that generally serves a specific function and has a specific template. For example, in a blog application, you might have the following views:
trans-unit.target: 视图是Django应用程序中网页的“类型”，通常具有特定功能并具有特定模板。例如，在博客应用程序中，您可能具有以下视图：

trans-unit.source: A view is a callable which takes a request and returns a response. This can be more than just a function, and Django provides an example of some classes which can be used as views. These allow you to structure your views and reuse code by harnessing inheritance and mixins. There are also some generic views for tasks which we’ll get to later, but you may want to design your own structure of reusable views which suits your use case. For full details, see the class-based views reference documentation.
trans-unit.target: 视图是可调用的，它接受请求并返回响应。这不仅可以是一个函数，而且Django提供了一些可用作视图的类的示例。这些使您可以利用继承和混合来构造视图并重用代码。对于任务，还有一些通用的视图，我们将在以后进行介绍，但是您可能希望设计自己的可重用视图结构，以适合您的用例。有关完整的详细信息，请参见基于类的视图参考文档。

trans-unit.source: A view name, possibly with arguments: reverse() will be used to reverse-resolve the name.
trans-unit.target: 视图名称，可能带有参数： reverse() 将用于反向解析名称。

trans-unit.source: A view needs CSRF protection under one set of conditions only, and mustn’t have it for the rest of the time.
trans-unit.target: 视图仅在一组条件下需要CSRF保护，并且在其余时间中一定不要使用它。

trans-unit.source: A view that displays a confirmation page and deletes an existing object. The given object will only be deleted if the request method is POST. If this view is fetched via GET, it will display a confirmation page that should contain a form that POSTs to the same URL.
trans-unit.target: 显示确认页面并删除现有对象的视图。仅当请求方法为 POST 时,才会删除给定的对象。如果通过 GET 获取此视图，它将显示一个确认页面，该页面应包含一个张贴到相同URL的表单。

trans-unit.source: A view that displays a form for creating an object, redisplaying the form with validation errors (if there are any) and saving the object.
trans-unit.target: 一个显示表单的视图,用于创建对象,重新显示带有验证错误(如果有)的表单并保存对象。

trans-unit.source: A view that displays a form for editing an existing object, redisplaying the form with validation errors (if there are any) and saving changes to the object. This uses a form automatically generated from the object’s model class (unless a form class is manually specified).
trans-unit.target: 一个视图，该视图显示用于编辑现有对象的表单，重新显示带有验证错误的表单（如果存在）并保存对对象的更改。这将使用从对象的模型类自动生成的表单（除非手动指定了表单类）。

trans-unit.source: A view that displays a form. On error, redisplays the form with validation errors; on success, redirects to a new URL.
trans-unit.target: 一个显示表单的视图。错误时,重新显示验证错误的表单;成功时,重定向到一个新的URL。

trans-unit.source: A view that produces a JavaScript code library with functions that mimic the gettext interface, plus an array of translation strings.
trans-unit.target: 生成JavaScript代码库的视图，该代码库具有模仿 gettext 接口的功能以及翻译字符串数组。

trans-unit.source: A weekly archive page showing all objects in a given week. Objects with a date in the future are not displayed unless you set allow_future to True.
trans-unit.target: 每周存档页面，显示给定一周中的所有对象。除非将 allow_future 设置为 True ,否则不会显示具有将来日期的对象。

trans-unit.source: A widget is Django’s representation of an HTML input element. The widget handles the rendering of the HTML, and the extraction of data from a GET/POST dictionary that corresponds to the widget.
trans-unit.target: 小部件是Django对HTML输入元素的表示。小部件处理HTML的呈现，并从与小部件相对应的GET / POST字典中提取数据。

trans-unit.source: A widget that handles multiple hidden widgets for fields that have a list of values.
trans-unit.target: 一个处理具有值列表的字段的多个隐藏小组件。

trans-unit.source: A widget that is composed of multiple widgets. MultiWidget works hand in hand with the MultiValueField.
trans-unit.target: 一个由多个小部件组成的小部件。 MultiWidget 与 MultiValueField 协同工作。

trans-unit.source: A widget’s template can be overridden by a project. (Reusable applications typically shouldn’t override built-in templates because they might conflict with a project’s custom templates.)
trans-unit.target: 窗口小部件的模板可以被项目覆盖。（可重用的应用程序通常不应覆盖内置模板，因为它们可能与项目的自定义模板冲突。）

trans-unit.source: A world-class geospatial framework built on top of Django, that enables storage, manipulation and display of spatial data.
trans-unit.target: 一个建立在Django之上的世界级地理空间框架,可以实现空间数据的存储、操作和显示。

trans-unit.source: A wrapper around pprint.pprint() – for debugging, really.
trans-unit.target: pprint.pprint() 的包装器–确实用于调试。

trans-unit.source: A wrapper around the JSON serializer from django.core.signing. Can only serialize basic data types.
trans-unit.target: django.core.signing 中的JSON序列化程序包装。只能序列化基本数据类型。

trans-unit.source: A wrapper of format_html(), for the common case of a group of arguments that need to be formatted using the same format string, and then joined using sep. sep is also passed through conditional_escape().
trans-unit.target: format_html() 的包装器，用于通常需要使用相同格式字符串格式化然后再使用 sep 联接的一组参数的情况。 sep 也通过 conditional_escape() 传递。

trans-unit.source: A yearly archive page showing all available months in a given year. Objects with a date in the future are not displayed unless you set allow_future to True.
trans-unit.target: 年度存档页面，显示给定年份中所有可用的月份。除非将 allow_future 设置为 True ,否则不会显示具有将来日期的对象。

trans-unit.source: Absolute filesystem path to the directory that will hold user-uploaded files.
trans-unit.target: 存放用户上传文件的目录的绝对文件系统路径。

trans-unit.source: Absolute path to the directory that will hold the files. Defaults to the value of your MEDIA_ROOT setting.
trans-unit.target: 存放文件的目录的绝对路径。默认为 MEDIA_ROOT 设置的值。

trans-unit.source: Absolutely NO guarantee is provided about the resulting string being HTML safe. So NEVER mark safe the result of a strip_tag call without escaping it first, for example with escape().
trans-unit.target: 绝对不能保证结果字符串是HTML安全的。因此，永远不要在未先转义的情况下将 strip_tag 调用的结果标记为安全，例如使用 escape() 。

trans-unit.source: Abstract base classes
trans-unit.target: 抽象基类

trans-unit.source: Abstract base classes are useful when you want to put some common information into a number of other models. You write your base class and put abstract=True in the Meta class. This model will then not be used to create any database table. Instead, when it is used as a base class for other models, its fields will be added to those of the child class.
trans-unit.target: 当您要将一些公共信息放入许多其他模型中时，抽象基类很有用。您编写基类，并将 abstract=True 放在Meta类中。这样，该模型将不会用于创建任何数据库表。相反，当将其用作其他模型的基类时，会将其字段添加到子类的字段中。

trans-unit.source: Abusing BinaryField
trans-unit.target: 滥用 BinaryField

trans-unit.source: Accepting optional arguments
trans-unit.target: 接受可选参数

trans-unit.source: Accepts a field name or expression, and a string or expression. Returns the trigram distance between the two arguments.
trans-unit.target: 接受一个字段名或表达式,以及一个字符串或表达式。返回两个参数之间的三段式距离。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a field name or expression, and a string or expression. Returns the trigram similarity between the two arguments.
trans-unit.target: 接受一个字段名或表达式,以及一个字符串或表达式。返回两个参数之间的卦象相似度。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a floating point number expressed in seconds since the epoch in UTC–such as that outputted by time.time(). If set to None, defaults to the current time.
trans-unit.target: 接受自UTC纪元以来以秒为单位的浮点数，例如 time.time() 输出的浮点数。如果设置为 None ，则默认为当前时间。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a geographic field or expression and a SRID integer code, and returns the transformed geometry to the spatial reference system specified by the srid parameter.
trans-unit.target: 接受地理字段或表达式和SRID整数代码，并将转换后的几何返回到 srid 参数指定的空间参考系统。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a geographic field or expression and attempts to convert the value into a valid geometry without losing any of the input vertices. Geometries that are already valid are returned without changes. Simple polygons might become a multipolygon and the result might be of lower dimension than the input.
trans-unit.target: 接受一个地理字段或表达式,并尝试将该值转换为有效的几何体,而不会丢失任何输入顶点。已经有效的几何体将不做任何改变而返回。简单的多边形可能会变成一个多边形,结果可能比输入的尺寸小。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a geographic field or expression and tests if the value is well formed. Returns True if its value is a valid geometry and False otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 接受地理区域或表达式，并测试值的格式是否正确。如果其值是有效的几何，则返回 True ,否则返回 False 。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a list of at least two field names or expressions and returns the first non-null value (note that an empty string is not considered a null value). Each argument must be of a similar type, so mixing text and numbers will result in a database error.
trans-unit.target: 接受至少两个字段名或表达式的列表,并返回第一个非空值(注意,空字符串不被视为空值)。每个参数必须是类似的类型,因此混合文本和数字将导致数据库错误。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a list of at least two field names or expressions and returns the greatest value. Each argument must be of a similar type, so mixing text and numbers will result in a database error.
trans-unit.target: 接受至少两个字段名或表达式的列表,并返回最大的值。每个参数必须是类似的类型,因此混合文本和数字将导致数据库错误。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a list of at least two field names or expressions and returns the least value. Each argument must be of a similar type, so mixing text and numbers will result in a database error.
trans-unit.target: 接受至少两个字段名或表达式的列表,并返回最小值。每个参数必须是类似的类型,因此混合文本和数字将导致数据库错误。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a list of at least two text fields or expressions and returns the concatenated text. Each argument must be of a text or char type. If you want to concatenate a TextField() with a CharField(), then be sure to tell Django that the output_field should be a TextField(). Specifying an output_field is also required when concatenating a Value as in the example below.
trans-unit.target: 接受至少两个文本字段或表达式的列表，并返回连接的文本。每个参数必须是文本或char类型。如果要将 TextField() 与 CharField() 连接起来，请确保告诉Django output_field 应该是 TextField() 。在连接 Value 时，也需要指定 output_field ，如下例所示。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a numeric field or expression and returns the text representation of the expression as a single character. It works the same as Python’s chr() function.
trans-unit.target: 接受数字字段或表达式，并将表达式的文本表示形式返回为单个字符。它的工作原理与Python的 chr() 函数相同。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a single geographic field or expression and returns a Keyhole Markup Language (KML) representation of the geometry.
trans-unit.target: 接受单个地理字段或表达式，并返回几何的Keyhole标记语言（KML）表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a single geographic field or expression and returns a Geographic Markup Language (GML) representation of the geometry.
trans-unit.target: 接受单个地理字段或表达式，并返回几何图形的地理标记语言（GML）表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a single geographic field or expression and returns a GeoHash representation of the geometry.
trans-unit.target: 接受单个地理字段或表达式，并返回几何的GeoHash表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a single geographic field or expression and returns a GeoJSON representation of the geometry. Note that the result is not a complete GeoJSON structure but only the geometry key content of a GeoJSON structure. See also GeoJSON Serializer.
trans-unit.target: 接受单个地理字段或表达式，并返回几何的GeoJSON表示形式。请注意，结果不是完整的GeoJSON结构，而仅仅是GeoJSON结构的 geometry 关键内容。另请参见GeoJSON Serializer。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a single geographic field or expression and returns a Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) representation of the geometry.
trans-unit.target: 接受单个地理字段或表达式，并返回几何的可缩放矢量图形（SVG）表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a single geographic field or expression and returns a Point geometry guaranteed to lie on the surface of the field; otherwise returns None.
trans-unit.target: 接受单个地理字段或表达式，并返回保证位于该字段表面上的 Point 几何；否则返回 None 。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a single geographic field or expression and returns a geometry with all points snapped to the given grid. How the geometry is snapped to the grid depends on how many numeric (either float, integer, or long) arguments are given.
trans-unit.target: 接受一个单一的地理区域或表达式,并返回一个包含所有点的几何体,并将其套入给定网格。几何图形如何套入网格取决于给定参数的数量(浮点数、整数或长数)。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a single geographic field or expression and returns a geometry with its coordinates offset by the x, y, and optionally z numeric parameters.
trans-unit.target: 接受单个地理字段或表达式，并返回其坐标偏移 x ， y 和（可选） z 数字参数的几何。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a single geographic field or expression and returns a geometry with reversed coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 接受一个单一的地理区域或表达式,并返回一个具有反向坐标的几何体。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a single geographic field or expression and returns a geometry with scaled coordinates by multiplying them with the x, y, and optionally z parameters.
trans-unit.target: 接受单个地理字段或表达式，并通过将其与 x ， y 和可选的 z 参数相乘来返回具有缩放坐标的几何。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a single geographic field or expression and returns a modified version of the polygon/multipolygon in which all exterior rings are oriented clockwise and all interior rings are oriented counterclockwise. Non-polygonal geometries are returned unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 接受一个单一的地理区域或表达式,并返回一个修改后的多边形/多角形,其中所有外环都是顺时针方向,所有内环都是逆时针方向。非多角形的几何图形将保持不变。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a single geographic field or expression and returns the centroid value of the geometry.
trans-unit.target: 接受单个地理字段或表达式，并返回几何的 centroid 值。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a single geographic field or expression and returns the area of the field as an Area measure.
trans-unit.target: 接受单个地理字段或表达式，并将该字段的 Area 作为“ 面积”度量值返回。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a single geographic field or expression and returns the geometry representing the bounding box of the geometry.
trans-unit.target: 接受一个单一的地理区域或表达式,并返回代表该几何体边界框的几何体。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a single geographic field or expression and returns the memory size (number of bytes) that the geometry field takes.
trans-unit.target: 接受单个地理字段或表达式,并返回几何字段占用的内存大小(字节数)。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a single geographic field or expression and returns the number of geometries if the geometry field is a collection (e.g., a GEOMETRYCOLLECTION or MULTI* field). Returns 1 for single geometries.
trans-unit.target: 如果几何字段是集合（例如， GEOMETRYCOLLECTION 或 MULTI* 字段），则接受单个地理字段或表达式并返回几何数量。对于单个几何返回1。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a single geographic field or expression and returns the number of points in a geometry.
trans-unit.target: 接受单个地理区域或表达式,并返回几何体中的点的数量。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a single geographic field or expression and returns the perimeter of the geometry field as a Distance object.
trans-unit.target: 接受单个地理字段或表达式，并将几何字段的周长作为 Distance 对象返回。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a single geographic field or expression and returns the smallest circle polygon that can fully contain the geometry.
trans-unit.target: 接受单个地理字段或表达式,并返回能够完全包含几何体的最小圆多边形。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a single geographic linestring or multilinestring field or expression and returns its length as a Distance measure.
trans-unit.target: 接受单个地理线串或多线串字段或表达式，并返回其长度作为 Distance 度量。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a single text field or expression and returns the MD5 hash of the string.
trans-unit.target: 接受单个文本字段或表达式,并返回字符串的MD5哈希值。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a single text field or expression and returns the Unicode code point value for the first character of that expression. It works similar to Python’s ord() function, but an exception isn’t raised if the expression is more than one character long.
trans-unit.target: 接受单个文本字段或表达式，并为该表达式的第一个字符返回Unicode代码点值。它的工作方式类似于Python的 ord() 函数，但是如果表达式长度超过一个字符，则不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a single text field or expression and returns the characters of that expression in reverse order.
trans-unit.target: 接受单个文本字段或表达式,并将该表达式的字符按相反顺序返回。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a single text field or expression and returns the lowercase representation.
trans-unit.target: 接受单个文本字段或表达式,并返回小写表示。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a single text field or expression and returns the number of characters the value has. If the expression is null, then the length will also be null.
trans-unit.target: 接受单个文本字段或表达式,并返回值的字符数。如果表达式为空,则长度也为空。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a single text field or expression and returns the particular hash of the string.
trans-unit.target: 接受单个文本字段或表达式,并返回字符串的特定哈希值。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a single text field or expression and returns the uppercase representation.
trans-unit.target: 接受单个文本字段或表达式,并返回大写表示。

trans-unit.source: Accepts any format understood by parse_duration().
trans-unit.target: 接受 parse_duration() 可以理解的任何格式。

trans-unit.source: Accepts two expressions and returns None if they are equal, otherwise returns expression1.
trans-unit.target: 接受两个表达式，如果相等则返回 None ，否则返回 expression1 。

trans-unit.source: Accepts two geographic fields or expressions and returns the distance between them, as a Distance object. On MySQL, a raw float value is returned when the coordinates are geodetic.
trans-unit.target: 接受两个地理字段或表达式，并将它们之间的距离作为 Distance 对象返回。在MySQL上，当坐标为大地坐标时，将返回原始浮点值。

trans-unit.source: Accepts two geographic fields or expressions and returns the distance between them. When used in an order_by() clause, it provides index-assisted nearest-neighbor result sets.
trans-unit.target: 接受两个地理字段或表达式并返回它们之间的距离。在 order_by() 子句中使用时，它提供索引辅助的最近邻居结果集。

trans-unit.source: Accepts two geographic fields or expressions and returns the geometric difference, that is the part of geometry A that does not intersect with geometry B.
trans-unit.target: 接受两个地理场或表达式,并返回几何差值,即几何体A与几何体B不相交的部分。

trans-unit.source: Accepts two geographic fields or expressions and returns the geometric intersection between them.
trans-unit.target: 接受两个地理区域或表达式,并返回它们之间的几何交叉点。

trans-unit.source: Accepts two geographic fields or expressions and returns the geometric symmetric difference (union without the intersection) between the given parameters.
trans-unit.target: 接受两个地理区域或表达式,并返回给定参数之间的几何对称差值(无交点的结合)。

trans-unit.source: Accepts two geographic fields or expressions and returns the union of both geometries.
trans-unit.target: 接受两个地理区域或表达式,并返回两个几何体的结合。

trans-unit.source: Accepts two numeric fields or expressions and returns the logarithm of the first to base of the second.
trans-unit.target: 接受两个数字字段或表达式,并返回第一个字段的对数到第二个字段的基数。

trans-unit.source: Accepts two numeric fields or expressions and returns the remainder of the first divided by the second (modulo operation).
trans-unit.target: 接受两个数字字段或表达式,并返回第一个字段除以第二个字段的余数(模数运算)。

trans-unit.source: Accepts two numeric fields or expressions and returns the value of the first raised to the power of the second.
trans-unit.target: 接受两个数字字段或表达式,并将第一个字段的值提高到第二个字段的幂。

trans-unit.source: Access the errors attribute to get a dictionary of error messages:
trans-unit.target: 访问 errors 属性以获取错误消息字典：

trans-unit.source: Access to delete an object is limited to users with the “delete” permission for that type of object.
trans-unit.target: 删除对象的权限仅限于具有该对象类型的“删除”权限的用户。

trans-unit.source: Access to view objects is limited to users with the “view” or “change” permission for that type of object.
trans-unit.target: 对查看对象的访问仅限于对该类型对象具有“查看”或“更改”权限的用户。

trans-unit.source: Access to view the “add” form and add an object is limited to users with the “add” permission for that type of object.
trans-unit.target: 只有具有相应类型对象“添加”权限的用户才能查看“添加”表单和添加对象。

trans-unit.source: Access to view the change list, view the “change” form and change an object is limited to users with the “change” permission for that type of object.
trans-unit.target: 只能查看具有该类型对象的“更改”权限的用户才能查看更改列表，查看“更改”表单和更改对象。

trans-unit.target: 访问“干净”数据

trans-unit.source: Accessing request.POST inside middleware before the view runs or in process_view() will prevent any view running after the middleware from being able to modify the upload handlers for the request, and should normally be avoided.
trans-unit.target: 在视图运行之前或在 process_view() 中访问中间件内部的 request.POST 将阻止在中间件之后运行的任何视图能够修改请求的上载处理程序，通常应避免。

trans-unit.target: 访问方法调用

trans-unit.source: Adding a foreign key from one of your own models to ContentType allows your model to effectively tie itself to another model class, as in the example of the Permission model above.
